remarks: Ordering on reals satisfies strict trichotomy.  Axiom 18 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  (This restates ~ ax-pre-lttri with ordering on the extended reals.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
statement: axlttri $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A < B <-> -. ( A = B \/ B < A ) ) ) $.
